title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 303.1 - Statement of purpose
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 303.1 - Statement of purpose

State Regulations

In accordance with subdivision 2 of section
20
of
the Workers' Compensation Law, this rule establishes an independent and
impartial forum for the resolution of workers' compensation claims submitted by
officers and employees of the Workers' Compensation Board and the State

Insurance Fund. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
303.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
